content:
Google Maps is an excellent tool for finding nearby cafes and getting an estimate of walking distance and time.

To get an estimate of walking distance and time between two locations on Google Maps:

1. **Open Google Maps** on your computer or mobile device.
2. **Enter your starting location** (your apartment's address) in the search bar.
3. **Enter the destination** (the cafe's address) in the search bar.
4. **Click on the "Directions" button** (represented by a blue arrow icon).
5. **Select the "Walking" mode** (represented by a pedestrian icon) from the transportation modes at the top of the screen.
6. **Google Maps will display the walking route**, along with an estimate of the **distance** and **walking time**.

You can also use the "Get Directions" feature on Google Maps to get an estimate of walking distance and time. Simply enter your starting and ending points, and Google Maps will provide the walking directions, distance, and time.

Additionally, you can use other features on Google Maps to get a better sense of the walking route:

* **Street View**: Click on the Street View button (represented by a little orange person) to see what the walking route looks like, including any potential obstacles or challenges.
* **Terrain view**: Click on the "Terrain" button to see the elevation changes along the walking route.

By using these features, you can get a good estimate of the walking distance and time between your apartment and the cafe, and plan your route accordingly.
